Export.Routine:
CLNBQSETUPENG ; +--------------------------+ ; | Binary Queries | ; | Custom Field Description | ; | Language = English | ; +--------------------------+ ; Nov 21, 2006 by Mc_Fly ; TrakHealth BCN f n=1:1 s line=$t(@("data+"_n)) q:'$l(line) d . s line=$p(line," ",2,999) . i '$l($tr(line," "_$c(9))) q . s glo=$p($p(line,"=",1)," ",2,999) . i $d(@glo)#10=1 q . w !,line . x line q data ; No s'executa directament !!! s ^BQZ(1)="Requests" s ^BQZ(1,1,1)="Requests" s ^BQZ(1,1,3)="Test Sets" s ^BQZ(1,1,4)="Results" s ^BQZ(1,1,5)="Antibiograms"
